WorkItem.Description:
Problem __and quick solution__ is fully described here:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/23855003/phpexcel-error-while-trying-to-insert-image-after-loading-and-writing

How to replicate:

1. Create new XLSX file with one image (PHPExcel_Worksheet_Drawing)
2. Save & close this file
3. Open this file again and add second image.
4. Try to save & close.

At step 4 there is
> Fatal error: Uncaught exception 'PHPExcel_Writer_Exception' with message 'File zip://XXX#xl/media/image1.png does not exist' in YYY\PHPExcel\Writer\Excel2007\ContentTypes.php:242 
(XXX and YYY are some proper paths)
WorkItem.Summary: Adding new image to existing XLSX file causes error
